To my Christian friend, I.F. comfort in Christ during this life, and glory with Christ in the life to come Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Selections.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
For Richard Boyle dwelling in Black-friers[, Imprinted at London : 1590?]
Anonymous translation of extracts from the Psalms. Text begins: Selah. Suggested publication date from STC. Formerly also STC 10647. Identified as STC 10647 on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
